text: migrants in distress just outside Libyan
waters
search and rescue charity hands out
lifejackets but just behind them three
men on a speedboat approach
they want to take the engine off the
migrants boat
we're on a ship run by Doctors Without
Borders their mission is to save life
and one of the deadliest migration
routes in the world on this day they
pulled out nearly a thousand migrants
from six loads the smugglers are often
close by the rescue is barely halfway
through but we can see just a few metres
away this wipes people probably the
smugglers waiting of the boat is empty
so they can throw it back to Libya for
you it's highly possible but again we
have no idea in resequencing life we are
humanitarians you are not police and
innocence is the same as when we find
the Kalashnikov on a battlefield
you are not disarming the Calexico we
are just there to save life
as more migrant boats arrived the
Italian Coast Guard showed up in force
throughout the day the Italian Coast
Guard has been moving around trying to
set fire to as many of these smugglers
boats as possible both rubber boats and
wooden boats the EU says this is the
most important thing to do on the
central Mediterranean in addition to
saving light to disrupt the business
model of the smugglers and this is how
they do it but the strategy is now under
attack last week a report by Amnesty
International and this week a report
from the House of Lords both said that
the smugglers have adapted their tactics
by using boats in poorer condition and
putting more people on them that it's
the migrants who are paying with their
lives those who made it know they're
lucky this year alone more than 2,100
people have drowned off the coast of
Libya I think there is because I knew it
was 50/50 order you survive for your dad
do I get pretty bored and I believe that
when we finish we'll soon they will all
disembark in Italy but the tide in
Europe is turning against them other EU
countries have rejected repeated Italian
government pleas to open their ports to
the rescue ships for now European
governments remain focused on trying to
seal off the central Mediterranean route
romney-ryan BBC news from the central
Mediterranean
